testcase.name: Add a new recipe and then update newly added recipe's name.
testcase.system-out: * url urlParam = 'http://localhost:8080' .................................. passed And print 'urlParam :',urlParam ........................................... passed * def dataFile = 'recipe-file.json' ....................................... passed * def add = call read('classpath:com/recipebook/testsuit/addRecipe.feature') {"name": "veg pasta","dateCreated": "2022-05-19","isVeg" : true,"serves": 4,"ingredients": [{"name": "pasta",}, {"name": "tomato"}, {"name": "garlic"}],"instructions" : "boil pasta, cut tomato"} . passed * def value = add.response ................................................ passed * def payload = ........................................................... passed Given path '/recipes/update/'+value.id+'' ................................. passed And request payload ....................................................... passed When method put ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * def output = response ................................................... passed And print 'response :',output ............................................. passed Then assert responseTime < '100000' ....................................... passed Then match response.id =='#notnull' ....................................... passed Then match response.name == '#(recipeName2)' ............................. passed
